title: Bissell CleanView Compact Upright Vacuum, Fits in Dorm Rooms & Apartments, Lightweight with Powerful Suction and Removable Extension Wand, 3508
description: CleanView® Compact upright vacuum is lightweight and maneuverable at less than 8 pounds, so it’s perfect for cleaning everyday messes and hard-to-reach spaces alike. With the removable extension wand and 23 ft power cord, you can reach higher and clean more spaces without needing to change plugs. Plus, the combination of a powerful rotating brush and scatter-free technology delivers a thorough, easy clean. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
